task.name: uvcontsub2

param.name: vis
param.description: Name of input MS. Output goes to vis + ".contsub"

param.name: field
param.description: Select field(s) using id(s) or name(s)

param.name: fitspw
param.description: Spectral window:channel selection for fitting the continuum

param.name: combine
param.description: Data axes to combine for the continuum estimation (none or spw and/or scan)

param.name: want_cont
param.description: Create vis + ".cont" to hold the continuum estimate.

task.example:
uvcontsub2 has been renamed to uvcontsub. For now uvcontsub2 is an alias for uvcontsub, but that may change.
For parameter descriptions, please see the help of uvcontsub.
